mapper.select: select * from fit_history order by his_id desc
mapper.insert: insert into fit_history (his_mememail, his_proid, his_since, his_period, his_paid, his_regid, his_catid, his_date, his_id) values (#{hisMemEmail}, #{hisProId}, #{hisSince}, #{hisPeriod}, #{hisPaid}, #{hisRegId}, #{hisCatId}, #{hisDate}, #{hisId})
